name: Seeking Missile
description:
After a character switch takes place in this play area: Deal 2 Physical DMG to the character activated.
Usage(s): 2
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After a character switch takes place in this play area:</color> Deal 2 $[K100] to the character activated.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After a character switch takes place in this play area:</color> Deal 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color> to the character activated.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 2</color>
